The shooting-exposed (reference) areas include providers practicing 0ÃÂ¢Ãâ¬Ãâ5 (10ÃÂ¢Ãâ¬Ãâ15) miles from an affected school. All regressions only consider fatal school shootings, consider a two-year follow-up window, and are weighted by school enrollment. Standard errors (reported in parentheses) are clustered at the school-by-area level. For ease of comparison, Column (1) replicates our baseline results from Table 2.
